title: I Wear My Sunglasses At Zeit 8/4: Lambda Variant, Eviction Moratorium, Rihanna, Meghan Markle, Obama, Washington Guardians
itunes:title: I Wear My Sunglasses At Zeit 8/4: Lambda Variant, Eviction Moratorium, Rihanna, Meghan Markle, Obama, Washington Guardians
description:
In this edition of I Wear My Sunglasses At Zeit, Miles and Super Producer Anna Hossnieh discuss the Lambda variant, the eviction moratorium being extended, Rihanna becoming a billionaire, Meghan Markle and Obama's Birthdays, and The Washington Guardians telling fans not to show up in culturally insensitive attire

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
